desc: Mason jars, Weck Jars, glass jars, canning jars, fermentation jars, jam jars, juice jars and storage solutions for your homemade food. Perfect for preserving, making jams, chutneys and just for presenting what you made at home.

layout.text:
Large range of Weck Jars and other jars available at great prices.
Fast delivery from our warehouse in Wexford.
Free shipping from €50.
